meanings.definition: A collection of documents about a particular person, event, or subject.
meanings.sent1: The detective carefully reviewed the dossier on the suspect.
meanings.sent2: She kept a dossier of all the important papers in her office.
meanings.sent3: The cat created a dossier of all the toys it had hidden around the house.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a messy dossier, full of scattered memories waiting to be organized.
meanings.sent5: The dossier on ancient civilizations was so detailed, it felt like stepping back in time.

meanings.definition: A file containing detailed information or records.
meanings.sent1: The employee's dossier included his work history and performance reviews.
meanings.sent2: Please place this document in the appropriate dossier for easy reference.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's secret dossier contained maps of all the nut stashes in the park.
meanings.sent4: Her heart was a locked dossier, hiding the truth about her past relationships.
meanings.sent5: The dossier on rare birds was so comprehensive, it could fill a library.
